text: Labidosauriscus is an extinct genus of anapsid reptile from the Permian period of North America. Fossils have been discovered in Oklahoma. == References == Category:Permian reptiles of North America Category:Captorhinids Category:Cisuralian genus first appearances Category:Cisuralian genus extinctions Category:Fossil taxa described in 2018
title: Labidosauriscus
